title: Different Graphical Representations
question_text: April loves the springtime but wondered which season was the favorite among students at her high school.  To investigate, she randomly surveyed other students.  The following frequency table shows the responses. Frequency Spring 14 Summer 18 Fall 12 Winter 6 Which of the following graphs does not provide an appropriate representation of the data?
